description:
Based off the original hat that made Tilley a household name. This kids wide brimmed hat has the highest sun protection while having snap-up sides and embroidered eyelets for venting that unwanted heat. Your kid won’t want to take it off!

  • Durable cotton has UPF 50+ sun protection, blocking more than 98% of harsh UV
  • DWR finish helps shed light rain
  • Embroidered rivets offer airflow and improved breathability
  • Foam brim keeps hat afloat should it fall in the water
  • Velcro chin strap keeps hat secure in gusty conditions
  • Hidden pocket for those mid-hike tasty treats
name: Tilley Mini Classic - Children
